thread.title: BRIEF-Hydropothecary Selects Shopify To Power Ecommerce Services For Medical And Recreational Cannabis Markets

title: BRIEF-Hydropothecary Selects Shopify To Power Ecommerce Services For Medical And Recreational Cannabis Markets

organizations.name: mmerce services for medical and recreational cannabis markets reuters

text: March 20, 2018 / 11:00 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Hydropothecary Selects Shopify To Power Ecommerce Services For Medical And Recreational Cannabis Markets Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Hydropothecary Corp: * HYDROPOTHECARY SELECTS SHOPIFY TO POWER ECOMMERCE SERVICES FOR MEDICAL AND RECREATIONAL CANNABIS MARKETS * HYDROPOTHECARY CORP - ‍REACHED DEAL WITH SHOPIFY, TO BUILD ITS ECOMMERCE PLATFORM FOR CANNABIS PRODUCTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
